price: „О Мојсије“, рекоше онда, „хоћеш ли ти, или ћемо ми да бацимо?“
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
